ygData.subject: Re: Level progression
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Go to The toxxullia forest my fine Ranger.  The Tox has much less people in the zone than anyplace around Qeynos.  Also it is mostly spell casters so your
ygData.messageBody:
Quoting Karim Sanjabi <karim@...>:

> From: Karim Sanjabi <karim@...>
>
>
> Hi everyone, I\'m new to the list.
>
> I was wondering what areas and monsters you are finding have the best exp
> potential? I am a Ranger in Qeynos and basically have found that Black
> Burrow or the Karana plains are about it for levels 6-9 that I can find.
> Where else in the Qeynos area (or other areas) have great exp potential?
>
> Are there other \"dungeons\" in the areas (I know of the aquaducks, but they
> are a bit slow)?
>
> Thanks,
>
> Karim / Alladine

Go to The toxxullia forest my fine Ranger. The Tox has much less people in the
zone than anyplace around Qeynos. Also it is mostly spell casters so your
fighting skills are needed. Another good point is the fact that you can track,
and the Toxullia forest is a dark foggy place that is hard to see in. There are

pleanty of poachers and undead to slay can gain from (xp for lv 6-8). Not to
sure of above that in the Tox, but you can go to Kerra Isle with a good group
and survive if you make sure to con everything first. These are good places for

Rangers, I have partied with a few in Qeynos and crossed the boat to Erudin and
had a non-stop hunting spree (except for my resting to get mana that is) for
some great gains in my powers. So it is one option that you can consider my
fine Ranger.

Zakrul The Traveler
Companion
Wizard
